sources.title: The Helicopter (1944)
sources.description: The tiny toy helicopter which all the little mice didn't think was worth bother with, comes to the rescue of a mouse that has been trapped by the cat. The helicopter saves the day and becomes a mouse-hero icon. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-helicopter-1944/

metadata.Plot: The tiny toy helicopter which all the little mice didn't think was worth bother with, comes to the rescue of a mouse that has been trapped by the cat. The helicopter saves the day and becomes a mouse-hero icon.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
